briefdescription.para: #HTAB hash table for storing a #plvs_context_cache_value user_id.

detaileddescription.para: A javascript context is stored here by user_id. This allows for javascript contexts to be separated by postgres user, keeping a copy of the current javascript context and all functions defined in the javascript context by fn_oid.

briefdescription.para: #MemoryContext where all cached memory is allocated.
Initializes the cache #HTAB along with the #MemoryContext where cached memory is allocated.
Clears all caches and recreates them.
Adds a pljs_context_cache_value for a user_id.

detaileddescription.para: Creates a pljs_context_cache_value and fills it with the javascript context and #HTAB storing pljs_function_cache_value entries by fn_oid.

parameterdescription.para: #Oid - user ID for the #JSContext to be assigned to
#JSContext - context to be added to the cache

briefdescription.para: Removes a pljs_context_cache_value for a user_id.

detaileddescription.para:
Removes a cache entry from the cache by user_id.
user_id
#Oid - user ID for which to remove the cache entries

briefdescription.para: Finds a pljs_context_cache_value for a user_id.

simplesect.para: pljs_context_cache_value that is found, or NULL if not found

briefdescription.para: Adds a javascript function in the cache for a user_id and fn_oid.

detaileddescription.para:
Adds a function by creating a pljs_function_cache_value and populating it from a pljs_context.
context
Pointer to pljs_context

briefdescription.para: Finds a pljs_function_cache_value for a user_id and fn_oid.

simplesect.para: pljs_function_cache_value that is found, or NULL if not found

briefdescription.para: Fills a pljs_context from a pljs_function_cache_value.

detaileddescription.para:
Copies the data from a pljs context to a function cache value.
context
Pointer to pljs_context to copy from
function_entry
Pointer to pljs_function_cache_value to fill

briefdescription.para: Fills a pljs_function_cache_value from a pljs_context.

detaileddescription.para:
Copies the data from a function cache value to a pljs context.
function_entry
Pointer to pljs_function_cache_value to copy from
context
Pointer to pljs_context to fill
